text: being through the help of the Lord humbled by them who in his eyes were held to be of least account, took off his glorious apparel, and passing through the country, 8:35 Gr. having made himself solitary. shunning all company like a fugitive slave, arrived at Antioch, 8:35 Or, having won the greatest possible favor by reason of the destruction of his army having, as he thought, had the greatest possible good fortune, though his army was destroyed.
